name: WellSphere
description: WellSphere is a wellness app designed to improve your overall wellbeing by focusing on six key areas: emotional, social, physical, academic, financial, and spiritual. Achieve balance in life with personalized tools that help you grow in each dimension. Start your wellness journey with WellSphere!
